question: How do I select a catastrophic plan on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace?
text:
How do I select a catastrophic plan on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace?
          
        
If you are under the age of 30, Virginia's Insurance Marketplace will automatically include
catastrophic plans
in your plan shopping experience.
If you are over the age of 30, you will need to receive an
exemption certificate number
from healthcare.gov and enter your exemption information on the Virginia's Insurance Marketplace eligibility application to be able to see catastrophic plans in plan shopping.
Please call healthcare.gov at 1-800-318-2596 for assistance with completion and status of your hardship exemption. Healthcare.gov is only processing your exemption application. You will need to shop and enroll in coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace once you have your exemption certificate number from healthcare.gov.
